= How to =
_A step by step walkthrough_

=== How do I add an item via the bar code scanner? ===
  # Navigate to the main menu of out application.
  # Select Add Item.
  # Select With Bar Code Scanner.
  # Scan the item.

=== How do I add an item by name? ===
  # Navigate to the main menu of out application.
  # Select Add Item.
  # Select By Name.
  # Search for the item
  # Select the item
  # Specify the quantity and unit.

=== How do I find a random recipe? ===
  # Navigate to the main menu of our application.
  # Select Random Recipe.

=== How do I check your inventory? ===
  # Navigate to the main menu of our application.
  # Select View Inventory.

=== How do I search for a recipe? ===
  # Navigate to the main menu of our application.
  # Select the Look Up Recipe.
  # Choose either Using Inventory or All accordingly.
  # Scroll Through recipes or type in the name of the recipe.

=== How do I specify which cooking devices I have? ===
  # Navigate to the main menu of our application.
  # Select Manage Cooking Devices
  # Make sure that those that are checked are the devices you have and those that are uncheck are devices that you do not have.
